text: James Dadford (born 1769) was an English canal engineer, as were his father Thomas Dadford and brothers Thomas Dadford, Jr. and John Dadford. He was engineer of the Gloucester and Berkeley Canal from 1795 to 1800. ==See also== *Canals of the United Kingdom *History of the British canal system ==References== Category:English canal engineers Category:1769 births Category:Year of death missing
title: James Dadford
